name: Wild Ape Simulator
description:
Do you want to know how real wild ape attacks? In this gorilla simulator game, save your gorilla from wild panther, cheetah, crocodile, and loins. Try to save yourself and hit them back with your strength to show them who is king of the jungle, beat them all with your strength and speed.

Game Features
• Actual thrill of chasing down animals
• Amazing 3D graphics and jungle environment
• Many thrilling levels
• Awesome gameplay with Gorilla attacking animations
